Interface DAOFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLiteDAOFactory
public interface DAOFactory
Factory interface to provide Data Access Objects (DAOs) for different entities. Implementations of this interface supply DAO instances for sessions, users, file metadata, and file blocks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    FileBlockDAO
    getFileBlockDAO()
    Returns the Data Access Object for file block-related operations.
    FileMetadataDAO
    getFileMetadataDAO()
    Returns the Data Access Object for file metadata-related operations.
    SessionDAO
    getSessionDAO()
    Returns the Data Access Object for session-related operations.
    UserDAO
    getUserDAO()
    Returns the Data Access Object for user-related operations.
